mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(BNO, BTITLE, BKIND, BCONTENT, BWRITER, REGDATE) VALUES(BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{btitle}, #{bkind}, #{bcontent}, #{bwriter}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT BNO, BTITLE, BKIND, BCONTENT, BWRITER, TO_CHAR(REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS') AS REGDATE, VIEWCNT FROM BOARD ORDER BY REGDATE DESC
SELECT TO_CHAR(REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS') FROM BOARD ORDER BY REGDATE DESC

SELECT B.BNO, B.BTITLE, B.BKIND, B.BCONTENT, B.BWRITER, B.REGDATE, B.VIEWCNT FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.BNO, A.BTITLE, A.BKIND, A.BCONTENT, A.BWRITER, A.REGDATE, A.VIEWCNT FROM( SELECT BNO, BTITLE, BKIND, BCONTENT, BWRITER, TO_CHAR(REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS') AS REGDATE, VIEWCNT FROM BOARD ORDER BY REGDATE DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM <=10 )B WHERE B.RNUM >= 1
